name: Night Candy
description:
In „Night Candy“ you and your friend take control of two Halloween candies that need to make it through the night without getting caught by one of the sugar-hungry kids searching for you.
When one of you’s in a jam, help each other by ringing one of the two bells in the village or rattling either of the manholes. And you have one more trick up your sleeve: for a short time, one of you can transition into a ghost that scares away nearby kids. But be careful, only one of you can use this ability at a time.

- Move: left mouse / left joystick
- Ghost Ability: right mouse click / right shoulder button
